name: Bulletin Internationale de L'Etoile (IAPSOP)
content:
Bulletin Internationale de L'Etoile (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Bulletin Internationale de L'Etoile Summary  From Pat Deveney's database: Bulletin Internationale de l'Etoile. 1927—1930 Monthly, irregular Ommen, Holland. Language: French. Publisher: Star Publishing Trust. Editor: Mme Zelma Blech. Succeeds: Bulletin de l'Ordre de l'Etoile d'Orient Corporate author: Organe Officiel de l'Ordre de l'Etoile 1/1. 1927 No. 4 is October 1927. 12-25 francs a year, 32 pp. This was a French translation of the International Star Bulletin published in London by Lady Emily Lutyens and D. Rajagopal. The Order of the Star, of which this was the official organ, was devoted to spreading word of the conferences and conversations of J. Krishnamurti, and it continued to do so after Krishnamurti in 1928 made it clear that his work had nothing to do with organizations. Issues:Bulletin Internationale de L'Etoile N11 Dec 1928 Bulletin Internationale de L'Etoile N7 Apr 1930 Bulletin Internationale de L'Etoile N11 Jun 1930
